summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        Your task: Provide a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image, focusing on its relevance to gameplay. 
        Describe key visual elements such as characters, enemies, UI components (e.g., health bars, icons), environments, or any text hints present. 
        Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game where a character, dressed in fur and wielding a flaming weapon, is engaged in combat with an enemy. The enemy appears to be a humanoid figure surrounded by a blue aura, and its health bar is partially depleted, indicating ongoing combat. The environment is a dark cave with rocky terrain and a large statue carved into the wall. Several UI components are visible: a health bar at the bottom left, a set of icons representing abilities or items, and a counter labeled "Will x106" on the right side of the screen. These elements suggest resource management and ability usage are key aspects of gameplay.
